about_the_game:
Welcome to the Wild World of Artovya!


As Sir Typhil of Creulor trekked through the kingdom of Artovya and beyond, he met many strange and unusual characters from far off places. Now a vast interdimensional war has broken out in the once peaceful realm. Dive more deeply into the bizarre land of Artovya in a thrilling CCG.

Embark on an extraordinary strategic journey where fantasy clashes with futuristic dystopias, strange alien beings, interdimensional chaos, and spine-chilling horror. Each deck you create is a gateway to a new world of possibilities. Welcome to the adventure that seamlessly blends complexity, visual brilliance, and accessible gameplay dynamics.

Explore Five Unique Factions:


Fantasy: Step into a land of knights, dragons, and ancient magic. Build your strength through healing, summon mighty creatures, and unleash devastating spells upon your adversaries.

Alien: Command uncanny alien species with unique abilities and unpredictable strategies. Utilize their biological superiority to outpace and outsmart your enemy.

Futuristic: Navigate through a neon-lit dystopian future where technology reigns supreme. Engage in espionage, hack your opponent's deck, and manipulate outcomes with cutting-edge tech.

Horror: Delve into the macabre with necromancy and control frightening monstrosities. Paralyze your opponents with fear, and turn the tides by bringing creatures back from the beyond.

Interdimensional: Manipulate space, time, and reality at your whim. Warp the very fabric of the game with cards that alter the state of play and disrupt the conventional rules of engagement.

Game Features:


  • In-Game Interactive Tutorial: Play through the tutorial levels to learn the mechanics and play styles of the game. Receive five free decks upon completion, so you can start playing right away!

  • Dual-Realm Game Board: Each player commands their own realm. This spatial aspect requires strategic positioning and movement of cards across the board, adding a layer of tactical depth. Master the art of maneuvering your forces to outwit your opponent.

  • Diverse Strategic Approaches: Instead of limiting players to predefined archetypes, Artovya provides a toolbox of versatile and diverse card options, encouraging players to explore their own style of play. Whether you lean towards aggressive assaults, defensive stands, or cunning tactical plays, you'll find the cards to support your strategy.

  • Strategically Paced Gameplay: Gameplay supports more calculated thinking. Artovya invites players to deeply engage with the mechanics and explore creative deck building. This pacing ensures that even non-meta, experimental decks can find their place and succeed, giving players the freedom to try new and unconventional strategies without dying in the first 3 turns or suddenly losing out of nowhere.

  • Regular Updates: The game will be added to with new, interesting features and cards regularly, keeping the gameplay fresh and exciting.

  • Community and Multiplayer Focus: Engage with a vibrant community and challenge players from around the world. Build your decks, share strategies, and make friends.

Whether you’re a tactical thinker or a lore enthusiast, this game offers something for everyone. Unleash your creativity, plan your strategies, and rise to become the ultimate master of Artovya. Ready your deck and prepare for battle — the realms await!

content_descriptors.notes: Due to the ever-evolving nature of the game, the specific content may vary. While we do not plan to add extremely explicit content, content could include: tame nudity, mild drug references (usually fictional or legal drugs), depictions of violent or cruel acts, depictions of undesirable situations or living conditions.
